description: Staking can be a valuable way to support network health and earn additional yield on crypto, but in the past users have been forced to sacrifice liquidity for this opportunity. A new crop of providers is looking to eliminate that tradeoff.

title: Web3 - A Transformative And Disruptive Multi-Trillion-Dollar Opportunity To Service Billions
author: Roomy Khan
description: Web3 sector will grow at a roughly 50 percent compound annual growth rate (CAGR) to become a multi-trillion-dollar industry over the next decade. Web3 could go from a buzzword to mainstream, disrupting existing businesses while creating massive new markets.

description: Crypto VC Emma Cui started her career in banking and now runs the leading web3 accelerator in all of Asia. She believes that now is an optimal time to invest in companies building the foundation that will shape the future of decentralized finance (DeFi.)

description: The question is whether we are in the midst of a crypto winter or even a crypto ice age. In this article, we highlight the current trends in the crypto space and explain what the "crypto winter" is all about.

title: Web3 Will Make Or Break Social Media
author: Lawrence Wintermeyer
description: Web3 has been hailed as the savior of the internet, a new paradigm, the future of networking, and a digital revolution. Ownership of user-created content, greater privacy might be easy concepts to sell, but achieving this grand vision is likely to take longer than web3 architects hope.

title: A Path To Crypto Regulation: New Scholarship Sheds Light During Crypto Winter

description: In these dark days of crypto winter, sometimes the brightest light can come from the least expected of places, like a really long law article with an inscrutable name that considers 276 appellate opinions of Howey precedent.
